content:
Welcome to my Personal Website! I originally created this website using Twitter Bootstrap. However, I later decided to rebuild it with Hugo, a platform that I had never worked with before. But to be honest, I now truly appreciate its capabilities :).
Hugo has made it incredibly easy for me to create, manage, and publish content like what you are seeing here.
How I deploy the site? In my infrastructure, I have two Git repositories. The first one, ‚Äúpersonal_website,‚Äù contains all the Hugo code required to build the site. The second one, ‚ÄúPamilator.github.io,‚Äù receives the ‚Äúpublic‚Äù folder generated during the build, which represents the actual website. I deliberately separated the code from the result, and for now, it‚Äôs sufficient for my needs.
Feel free to check out my repositories:
Pamilator.github.io personal_website Not much more to say for now, but I‚Äôm considering purchasing a fancy domain name, something like cedricfamin.me. Stay tuned for updates! üòÑ
summary: Check how I made this website using Hugo.
